issue.title: [C++] Appveyor separate jobs for Debug/Release builds from sources; Build with conda toolchain; Build with NMake Makefiles Generator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1196](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1196). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Appveyor build matrix to be extended with following jobs:

- Toolchain job with libs installed from conda
- Release/Debug jobs to build Arrow and Arrow's 3rd party dependencies from sources
- Job to build with NMake Makefiles cmake generator (Visual Studio 14 2015 Win64 generator is used in all others jobs)
